channel.title: 6. Self-Evaluation :: AWS Intership Report
channel.description: During my internship at AWS Vietnam (September â€“ December 2025), I had the opportunity to explore cloud computing in depth while building and documenting a practical learning project. I approached each task sincerely, researching carefully, understanding concepts before applying them, and prioritizing correctness over rushing. Across the 12 weeks, I steadily expanded my abilities in AWS services, backend development, cloud optimization, DevOps, and security engineering. The internship helped me form a structured technical mindset and improved my confidence in working with real cloud infrastructure.
